netcdf test_echam_spectral {
dimensions:
	time = UNLIMITED ; // (8 currently)
	lat = 96 ;
	lon = 192 ;
	mlev = 47 ;
	ilev = 48 ;
	spc = 2080 ;
	complex = 2 ;
variables:
	float abso4(time, lat, lon) ;
		abso4:long_name = "antropogenic sulfur burden" ;
		abso4:units = "kg/m**2" ;
		abso4:code = 235 ;
		abso4:table = 128 ;
		abso4:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float aclcac(time, mlev, lat, lon) ;
		aclcac:long_name = "cloud cover" ;
		aclcac:code = 223 ;
		aclcac:table = 128 ;
		aclcac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float aclcov(time, lat, lon) ;
		aclcov:long_name = "total cloud cover" ;
		aclcov:code = 164 ;
		aclcov:table = 128 ;
		aclcov:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ahfcon(time, lat, lon) ;
		ahfcon:long_name = "conductive heat flux through ice" ;
		ahfcon:units = "W/m**2" ;
		ahfcon:code = 208 ;
		ahfcon:table = 128 ;
		ahfcon:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ahfice(time, lat, lon) ;
		ahfice:long_name = "conductive heat flux" ;
		ahfice:units = "W/m**2" ;
		ahfice:code = 125 ;
		ahfice:table = 128 ;
		ahfice:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ahfl(time, lat, lon) ;
		ahfl:long_name = "latent heat flux" ;
		ahfl:units = "W/m**2" ;
		ahfl:code = 147 ;
		ahfl:table = 128 ;
		ahfl:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ahfliac(time, lat, lon) ;
		ahfliac:long_name = "latent heat flux over ice" ;
		ahfliac:units = "W/m**2" ;
		ahfliac:code = 110 ;
		ahfliac:table = 128 ;
		ahfliac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ahfllac(time, lat, lon) ;
		ahfllac:long_name = "latent heat flux over land" ;
		ahfllac:units = "W/m**2" ;
		ahfllac:code = 112 ;
		ahfllac:table = 128 ;
		ahfllac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ahflwac(time, lat, lon) ;
		ahflwac:long_name = "latent heat flux over water" ;
		ahflwac:units = "W/m**2" ;
		ahflwac:code = 111 ;
		ahflwac:table = 128 ;
		ahflwac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ahfres(time, lat, lon) ;
		ahfres:long_name = "melting of ice" ;
		ahfres:units = "W/m**2" ;
		ahfres:code = 209 ;
		ahfres:table = 128 ;
		ahfres:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ahfs(time, lat, lon) ;
		ahfs:long_name = "sensible heat flux" ;
		ahfs:units = "W/m**2" ;
		ahfs:code = 146 ;
		ahfs:table = 128 ;
		ahfs:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ahfsiac(time, lat, lon) ;
		ahfsiac:long_name = "sensible heat flux over ice" ;
		ahfsiac:units = "W/m**2" ;
		ahfsiac:code = 119 ;
		ahfsiac:table = 128 ;
		ahfsiac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ahfslac(time, lat, lon) ;
		ahfslac:long_name = "sensible heat flux over land" ;
		ahfslac:units = "W/m**2" ;
		ahfslac:code = 121 ;
		ahfslac:table = 128 ;
		ahfslac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ahfswac(time, lat, lon) ;
		ahfswac:long_name = "sensible heat flux over water" ;
		ahfswac:units = "W/m**2" ;
		ahfswac:code = 120 ;
		ahfswac:table = 128 ;
		ahfswac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float albedo(time, lat, lon) ;
		albedo:long_name = "surface albedo" ;
		albedo:code = 175 ;
		albedo:table = 128 ;
		albedo:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float albedo_nir(time, lat, lon) ;
		albedo_nir:long_name = "surface albedo NIR range" ;
		albedo_nir:code = 101 ;
		albedo_nir:table = 128 ;
		albedo_nir:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float albedo_nir_dif(time, lat, lon) ;
		albedo_nir_dif:long_name = "surface albedo NIR range diffuse" ;
		albedo_nir_dif:code = 82 ;
		albedo_nir_dif:table = 128 ;
		albedo_nir_dif:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float albedo_nir_dir(time, lat, lon) ;
		albedo_nir_dir:long_name = "surface albedo NIR range direct" ;
		albedo_nir_dir:code = 80 ;
		albedo_nir_dir:table = 128 ;
		albedo_nir_dir:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float albedo_vis(time, lat, lon) ;
		albedo_vis:long_name = "surface albedo visible range" ;
		albedo_vis:code = 100 ;
		albedo_vis:table = 128 ;
		albedo_vis:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float albedo_vis_dif(time, lat, lon) ;
		albedo_vis_dif:long_name = "surface albedo visible range diffuse" ;
		albedo_vis_dif:code = 81 ;
		albedo_vis_dif:table = 128 ;
		albedo_vis_dif:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float albedo_vis_dir(time, lat, lon) ;
		albedo_vis_dir:long_name = "surface albedo visible range direct" ;
		albedo_vis_dir:code = 79 ;
		albedo_vis_dir:table = 128 ;
		albedo_vis_dir:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float alsobs(time, lat, lon) ;
		alsobs:long_name = "albedo of bare ice and snow without ponds" ;
		alsobs:code = 72 ;
		alsobs:table = 128 ;
		alsobs:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float alsoi(time, lat, lon) ;
		alsoi:long_name = "albedo of ice" ;
		alsoi:code = 122 ;
		alsoi:table = 128 ;
		alsoi:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float alsol(time, lat, lon) ;
		alsol:long_name = "albedo of land" ;
		alsol:code = 124 ;
		alsol:table = 128 ;
		alsol:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float alsom(time, lat, lon) ;
		alsom:long_name = "albedo of melt ponds" ;
		alsom:code = 71 ;
		alsom:table = 128 ;
		alsom:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float alsow(time, lat, lon) ;
		alsow:long_name = "albedo of water" ;
		alsow:code = 123 ;
		alsow:table = 128 ;
		alsow:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ameltdepth(time, lat, lon) ;
		ameltdepth:long_name = "total melt pond depth" ;
		ameltdepth:units = "m" ;
		ameltdepth:code = 77 ;
		ameltdepth:table = 128 ;
		ameltdepth:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ameltfrac(time, lat, lon) ;
		ameltfrac:long_name = "fract area of melt ponds on sea-ice" ;
		ameltfrac:code = 78 ;
		ameltfrac:table = 128 ;
		ameltfrac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float amlcorac(time, lat, lon) ;
		amlcorac:long_name = "mixed layer flux correction" ;
		amlcorac:units = "W/m**2" ;
		amlcorac:code = 89 ;
		amlcorac:table = 128 ;
		amlcorac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float ao3(time, mlev, lat, lon) ;
		ao3:long_name = "ipcc ozone" ;
		ao3:units = "kg/kg" ;
		ao3:code = 236 ;
		ao3:table = 128 ;
		ao3:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float apmeb(time, lat, lon) ;
		apmeb:long_name = "vertic integr tendenc of water" ;
		apmeb:units = "kg/m**2s" ;
		apmeb:code = 137 ;
		apmeb:table = 128 ;
		apmeb:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float apmegl(time, lat, lon) ;
		apmegl:long_name = "P-E over land ice" ;
		apmegl:units = "kg/m**2s" ;
		apmegl:code = 221 ;
		apmegl:table = 128 ;
		apmegl:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float aprc(time, lat, lon) ;
		aprc:long_name = "convective  precipitation" ;
		aprc:units = "kg/m**2s" ;
		aprc:code = 143 ;
		aprc:table = 128 ;
		aprc:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float aprl(time, lat, lon) ;
		aprl:long_name = "large scale precipitation" ;
		aprl:units = "kg/m**2s" ;
		aprl:code = 142 ;
		aprl:table = 128 ;
		aprl:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float aprs(time, lat, lon) ;
		aprs:long_name = "snow fall" ;
		aprs:units = "kg/m**2s" ;
		aprs:code = 144 ;
		aprs:table = 128 ;
		aprs:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float aps(time, lat, lon) ;
		aps:long_name = "surface pressure" ;
		aps:units = "Pa" ;
		aps:code = 134 ;
		aps:table = 128 ;
		aps:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float az0i(time, lat, lon) ;
		az0i:long_name = "roughness length over ice" ;
		az0i:units = "m" ;
		az0i:code = 116 ;
		az0i:table = 128 ;
		az0i:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float az0l(time, lat, lon) ;
		az0l:long_name = "roughness length over land" ;
		az0l:units = "m" ;
		az0l:code = 118 ;
		az0l:table = 128 ;
		az0l:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float az0w(time, lat, lon) ;
		az0w:long_name = "roughness length over water" ;
		az0w:units = "m" ;
		az0w:code = 117 ;
		az0w:table = 128 ;
		az0w:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float barefrac(time, lat, lon) ;
		barefrac:long_name = "bare ice fraction" ;
		barefrac:code = 70 ;
		barefrac:table = 128 ;
		barefrac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float dew2(time, lat, lon) ;
		dew2:long_name = "2m dew point temperature" ;
		dew2:units = "K" ;
		dew2:code = 168 ;
		dew2:table = 128 ;
		dew2:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float drain(time, lat, lon) ;
		drain:long_name = "drainage" ;
		drain:units = "kg/m**2s" ;
		drain:code = 161 ;
		drain:table = 128 ;
		drain:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float evap(time, lat, lon) ;
		evap:long_name = "evaporation" ;
		evap:units = "kg/m**2s" ;
		evap:code = 182 ;
		evap:table = 128 ;
		evap:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float evapiac(time, lat, lon) ;
		evapiac:long_name = "evaporation over ice" ;
		evapiac:units = "kg/m**2s" ;
		evapiac:code = 113 ;
		evapiac:table = 128 ;
		evapiac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float evaplac(time, lat, lon) ;
		evaplac:long_name = "evaporation over land" ;
		evaplac:units = "kg/m**2s" ;
		evaplac:code = 115 ;
		evaplac:table = 128 ;
		evaplac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float evapwac(time, lat, lon) ;
		evapwac:long_name = "evaporation over water" ;
		evapwac:units = "kg/m**2s" ;
		evapwac:code = 114 ;
		evapwac:table = 128 ;
		evapwac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float fage(time, lat, lon) ;
		fage:long_name = "aging factor of snow on ice" ;
		fage:code = 68 ;
		fage:table = 128 ;
		fage:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float friac(time, lat, lon) ;
		friac:long_name = "ice cover (fraction of grid box)" ;
		friac:code = 97 ;
		friac:table = 128 ;
		friac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float geosp(time, lat, lon) ;
		geosp:long_name = "surface geopotential (orography)" ;
		geosp:units = "m**2/s**2" ;
		geosp:code = 129 ;
		geosp:table = 128 ;
		geosp:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float glac(time, lat, lon) ;
		glac:long_name = "fraction of land covered by glaciers" ;
		glac:code = 232 ;
		glac:table = 128 ;
		glac:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float gld(time, lat, lon) ;
		gld:long_name = "glacier depth" ;
		gld:units = "m" ;
		gld:code = 213 ;
		gld:table = 128 ;
		gld:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	double hyai(ilev) ;
		hyai:long_name = "hybrid A coefficient at layer interfaces" ;
		hyai:units = "Pa" ;
	double hyam(mlev) ;
		hyam:long_name = "hybrid A coefficient at layer midpoints" ;
		hyam:units = "Pa" ;
	double hybi(ilev) ;
		hybi:long_name = "hybrid B coefficient at layer interfaces" ;
		hybi:units = "1" ;
	double hybm(mlev) ;
		hybm:long_name = "hybrid B coefficient at layer midpoints" ;
		hybm:units = "1" ;
	int ilev(ilev) ;
		ilev:long_name = "hybrid level at layer interfaces" ;
		ilev:standard_name = "hybrid_sigma_pressure" ;
		ilev:units = "level" ;
		ilev:positive = "down" ;
		ilev:formula = "hyai hybi (ilev=hyai+hybi*aps)" ;
		ilev:formula_terms = "ap: hyai b: hybi ps: aps" ;
	double lat(lat) ;
		lat:long_name = "latitude" ;
		lat:units = "degrees_north" ;
		lat:standard_name = "latitude" ;
		lat:axis = "Y" ;
	double lon(lon) ;
		lon:long_name = "longitude" ;
		lon:units = "degrees_east" ;
		lon:standard_name = "longitude" ;
		lon:axis = "X" ;
	float lsp(time, spc, complex) ;
		lsp:long_name = "log surface pressure" ;
		lsp:code = 152 ;
		lsp:table = 128 ;
		lsp:grid_type = "spectral" ;
		lsp:axis = "T--" ;
		lsp:truncation = 63 ;
	int mlev(mlev) ;
		mlev:long_name = "hybrid level at layer midpoints" ;
		mlev:standard_name = "hybrid_sigma_pressure" ;
		mlev:units = "level" ;
		mlev:positive = "down" ;
		mlev:formula = "hyam hybm (mlev=hyam+hybm*aps)" ;
		mlev:formula_terms = "ap: hyam b: hybm ps: aps" ;
		mlev:borders = "ilev" ;
	float q(time, mlev, lat, lon) ;
		q:long_name = "specific humidity" ;
		q:units = "kg/kg" ;
		q:code = 133 ;
		q:table = 128 ;
		q:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float qres(time, lat, lon) ;
		qres:long_name = "residual heat flux for melting sea ice" ;
		qres:units = "W/m**2" ;
		qres:code = 126 ;
		qres:table = 128 ;
		qres:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float qvi(time, lat, lon) ;
		qvi:long_name = "vertically integrated water vapor" ;
		qvi:units = "kg/m**2" ;
		qvi:code = 230 ;
		qvi:table = 128 ;
		qvi:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float relhum(time, mlev, lat, lon) ;
		relhum:long_name = "relative humidity" ;
		relhum:code = 157 ;
		relhum:table = 128 ;
		relhum:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float runoff(time, lat, lon) ;
		runoff:long_name = "surface runoff and drainage" ;
		runoff:units = "kg/m**2s" ;
		runoff:code = 160 ;
		runoff:table = 128 ;
		runoff:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float sd(time, mlev, spc, complex) ;
		sd:long_name = "divergence" ;
		sd:units = "1/s" ;
		sd:code = 155 ;
		sd:table = 128 ;
		sd:grid_type = "spectral" ;
		sd:axis = "TZ--" ;
		sd:truncation = 63 ;
	float seaice(time, lat, lon) ;
		seaice:long_name = "ice cover (fraction of 1-SLM)" ;
		seaice:code = 210 ;
		seaice:table = 128 ;
		seaice:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float siced(time, lat, lon) ;
		siced:long_name = "ice depth" ;
		siced:units = "m" ;
		siced:code = 211 ;
		siced:table = 128 ;
		siced:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float sicepdi(time, lat, lon) ;
		sicepdi:long_name = "ice thickness on melt pond" ;
		sicepdi:units = "m" ;
		sicepdi:code = 74 ;
		sicepdi:table = 128 ;
		sicepdi:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float sicepdw(time, lat, lon) ;
		sicepdw:long_name = "melt pond depth on sea-ice" ;
		sicepdw:units = "m" ;
		sicepdw:code = 73 ;
		sicepdw:table = 128 ;
		sicepdw:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float sicepres(time, lat, lon) ;
		sicepres:long_name = "residual heat flux" ;
		sicepres:units = "W/m**2" ;
		sicepres:code = 76 ;
		sicepres:table = 128 ;
		sicepres:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float slm(time, lat, lon) ;
		slm:long_name = "land sea mask (1=land, 0=sea/lakes)" ;
		slm:code = 172 ;
		slm:table = 128 ;
		slm:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float sn(time, lat, lon) ;
		sn:long_name = "snow depth" ;
		sn:units = "m" ;
		sn:code = 141 ;
		sn:table = 128 ;
		sn:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float snacl(time, lat, lon) ;
		snacl:long_name = "snow accumulation over land" ;
		snacl:units = "kg/m**2s" ;
		snacl:code = 222 ;
		snacl:table = 128 ;

		snc:units = "m" ;
		snc:code = 233 ;
		snc:table = 128 ;
		snc:grid_type = "gaussian" ;

		sni:code = 214 ;

		snifrac:table = 128 ;

		snmel:code = 218 ;

		sofliac:code = 94 ;

	float srad0(time, lat, lon) ;
		srad0:long_name = "net top solar radiation" ;
		srad0:units = "W/m**2" ;
		srad0:code = 178 ;
		srad0:table = 128 ;
		srad0:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float srad0d(time, lat, lon) ;

		srad0d:units = "W/m**2" ;
		srad0d:code = 184 ;
		srad0d:table = 128 ;

		srad0u:long_name = "top solar radiation upward" ;

	float sradl(time, lat, lon) ;

		sradl:units = "W/m**2" ;
		sradl:code = 86 ;
		sradl:table = 128 ;
		sradl:grid_type = "gaussian" ;

		srads:units = "W/m**2" ;
		srads:code = 176 ;
		srads:table = 128 ;
		srads:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float sradsu(time, lat, lon) ;
		sradsu:long_name = "surface solar radiation upward" ;
		sradsu:units = "W/m**2" ;
		sradsu:code = 204 ;
		sradsu:table = 128 ;
		sradsu:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float sraf0(time, lat, lon) ;
		sraf0:long_name = "net top solar radiation     (clear sky)" ;
		sraf0:units = "W/m**2" ;
		sraf0:code = 187 ;
		sraf0:table = 128 ;
		sraf0:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float srafl(time, lat, lon) ;
		srafl:long_name = "solar radiation 200mb (clear sky)" ;
		srafl:units = "W/m**2" ;
		srafl:code = 88 ;
		srafl:table = 128 ;
		srafl:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float srafs(time, lat, lon) ;
		srafs:long_name = "net surface solar radiation (clear sky)" ;
		srafs:units = "W/m**2" ;
		srafs:code = 185 ;
		srafs:table = 128 ;
		srafs:grid_type = "gaussian" ;
	float st(time, mlev, spc, complex) ;
		st:long_name = "temperature" ;
		st:units = "K" ;
		st:code = 130 ;
		st:table = 128 ;
		st:grid_type = "spectral" ;
		st:axis = "TZ--" ;
		st:truncation = 63 ;
	float svo(time, mlev, spc, complex) ;
		svo:long_name = "vorticity" ;
		svo:units = "1/s" ;
		svo:code = 138 ;
		svo:table = 128 ;
		svo:grid_type = "spectral" ;
		svo:axis = "TZ--" ;
		svo:truncation = 63 ;
